title: Easy Access to Freeways, Crown Molding, Refrigerator with Ice Maker
neighborhood: 17621 W. Pauline Ct., Canyon Country, CA
posting_body: ['At Colony Townhomes in Santa Clarita, our apartments are a place you will love coming home to.', "Each of our available apartments has access to a beautiful picnic area with a barbecue and play area, which means you'll always have a place to take your family and friends.", 'We also provide great amenities for residents, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a cool swimming pool, and a relaxing spa for residents to maintain their high-energy lifestyles.', 'Each of our apartments also feature a personal garage for easy parking.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Dramatic Recessed Lighting', '-High Speed Internet Access Available', '-Two-Car Direct Access Garages', '-Dishwasher', '-Italian', 'Marble Bathroom Counters', '-Digital TV Available', '-Granite Countertops', '-Park-Like Apartment Community with Beautiful Landscaping', '-Five Soothing Spas', '-Enclosed Dog Park', '-BBQ and Picnic Areas', '-Easy Access to Freeways', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '17621 W. Pauline Ct., Canyon Country, CA 91387', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
